ResearchProjectDef.label: banana sowing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to grow banana trees, which produce delicious delicious bananas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: banana gastronomy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Examine basic cooking principles and see if they can be replicated with bananas.

ResearchProjectDef.label: basic banana weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Use basic weapon smithing concepts to create relatively basic banana based weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: banana curing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Examine basic anti scaria techniques and see if they can be reproduced with a mix of bananas and zombie bits.

ResearchProjectDef.label: banana power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harness the power of bananas and potassium to produce an explosive compound of banana slurry, which has uses ranging from powering your base to producing special banana items.

ResearchProjectDef.label: intermediate banana weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Utilize the power of the potassium slurry you have researched to create highly explosive weaponry.
